title: Skye Wheatley flaunts her ample assets in Bali
text:
She welcomed her first child last December.

And on Thursday, Skye Wheatley showed off her incredible post-baby body while on holiday in Bali.

Taking to Instagram, the 25-year-old shared a series of snaps flaunting her ample assets in a Baywatch-esque, fire-engine red swimsuit while scuba diving.

Sizzling! Big Brother's Skye Wheatley (pictured) flaunted her ample assets in a revealing swimsuit while she enjoyed some fun in the sun on holiday in Bali

In one snap, the stunning beauty looked a million bucks as she posed on the back of a boat in a pair of rental flippers and snorkel.

The social media sensation couldn't help but pout up a storm in another picture, as her enviable blonde locks dried in the sun.

The former Big Brother star captioned the snaps: 'Bali will forever be on my bucket list no matter how many times I go!'

She added: 'I can’t explain to you how stunning [Nusa] Lembongan truly is.'

Red hot: 'Bali will forever be on my bucket list no matter how many times I go!' she said

Sizzling: The social media sensation couldn't help but pout up a storm, as her enviable blonde locks dried in the sun

Skye welcomed son Forest in December 2018 with boyfriend Lachlan Waugh, who she met on Tinder.

The dazzling blonde snapped back to her pre-baby body in record time, and put it down to her new 'healthy lifestyle' in an Instagram post last month.

Posing in a racy white bikini to flaunt her frame, Skye wrote: 'I'm honestly pretty proud of how motivated I have been to get my pre-baby body back!

Family-of-three: Skye welcomed son Forest in December 2018 with boyfriend Lachlan Waugh (both pictured), who she met on Tinder

Transformation: The blonde snapped back to her pre-baby body in record time, and put it down to her new 'healthy lifestyle' in an Instagram post last month

'I'm actually more fit than I was before which is pretty crazy! Leading a healthy lifestyle is so important to me now because of how much better I feel.'

Skye continued: 'I have more energy for Forest and am in such a better mindset... it really helps with my mood and I overall just feel so much better in every way!'

The blonde bombshell rose to fame on the 2014 season of Big Brother Australia.

She now works as an influencer and vlogger.
description: She welcomed her first child last December.
authors: Tom Place For Daily Mail Australia
